title: ive played since s1 and i miss 20k bp for urf warwick
body:
i think i go under the category of a veteran player and i really want that urf warwick skin
is there any way i can get 20 k bp? if so plz tell me

replies.body: We can't make it rain BE just to get a rare skin unfortunately =(. Did you get all of your rewards for completing the conversion mission and opening the capsules yet?

20k is a LOT of BE.

You've had the best part of 4 months to get BE saved up, the best way was to buy champion shards and then disenchant them into BE, with an average of 10% profit.
